results.title: Acute and Chronic Pretreatment With Atenolol Attenuates Intestinal Ischemia and Reperfusion Injury in Hypercholesterolemic Rats.
results.text_hl: Acute and Chronic Pretreatment With @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ Attenuates @DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@Intestinal Ischemia@@@ and Reperfusion Injury in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@Hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Öztürk T, Vural K, Tuğlu İ, Var A, Kurdal T, Aydemir I. Acute and Chronic Pretreatment With Atenolol Attenuates Intestinal Ischemia and Reperfusion Injury in Hypercholesterolemic Rats. J Cardiothorac Vasc Anesth. 2016 Aug;30(4):985-92. PMID: 27521968

results.title: The influence of atenolol and prazosin on serum lipids and atherosclerosis in minipigs fed a hyperlipidemic diet.
results.text_hl: The effect of the adrenergic blockers @CHEMICAL_Prazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011224 @@@prazosin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ were tested in @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ Gottingen minipigs. 2.

citations.NLM: Nafstad I, Tollersrud S, Eriksen K, Helgeland A, Solberg LA, Bredesen J, Dale O. The influence of atenolol and prazosin on serum lipids and atherosclerosis in minipigs fed a hyperlipidemic diet. Gen Pharmacol. 1988;19(5):719-24. PMID: 2905683

results.title: [Comparative effects of captopril and atenolol on lipid metabolism in hypertensive hypercholesterolemic patients treated with pravastatin. A multicenter controlled trial].
results.text_hl: [Comparative effects of @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ metabolism in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@.

results.title: Studies on the glycemic and lipidemic effect of atenolol and propranolol in normal and diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: This effect was masked when @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was administered concurrently with @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@, but a @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ effect (p < 0.01) was noticed.

citations.NLM: Gaafar K, Salama S, el Batran S. Studies on the glycemic and lipidemic effect of atenolol and propranolol in normal and diabetic rats. Arzneimittelforschung. 1994 Apr;44(4):496-501. PMID: 8011003
citations.BibTeX: @article{8011003, title={Studies on the glycemic and lipidemic effect of atenolol and propranolol in normal and diabetic rats.}, author={Gaafar K and Salama S and el Batran S}, journal={Arzneimittelforschung}, volume={44}, number={4}, pages={496-501}}

results.title: Anti-sympathetic action enhances statin's pleiotropic effects: the combined effect of rosuvastatin and atenolol on endothelial function.
results.text_hl: METHODS: FMD and NMD were measured using the UNEXEF18G before and after 4-week treatment of @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ (5 mg/day) with or without @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (25 mg/day) in 44 @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (70+-8 years old, LDL-C >140 mg/dL) with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Takase B, Hattori H, Tanaka Y, Nagata M, Ishihara M. Anti-sympathetic action enhances statin's pleiotropic effects: the combined effect of rosuvastatin and atenolol on endothelial function. Int Angiol. 2014 Feb;33(1):27-34. PMID: 24452083
citations.BibTeX: @article{24452083, title={Anti-sympathetic action enhances statin's pleiotropic effects: the combined effect of rosuvastatin and atenolol on endothelial function.}, author={Takase B and Hattori H and Tanaka Y and Nagata M and Ishihara M}, journal={Int Angiol}, volume={33}, number={1}, pages={27-34}}
